document.title: Hot Topic: Joint Economic Development Boards Must Comply with Requirements of Public Chapter 1101
document.abstract: By July 1, 2004, every local government applying for a state grant administered by ECD must provide records that document a minimum of four board meetings and eight executive committee meetings were held during the previous 12 months.
